LanguageData.MGC_MaxGeneComplexityOffsetTooltip: A flat bonus to maximum gene complexity.
LanguageData.MGC_MaxGeneComplexityMultiplierTooltip: A multiplier to the maximum gene complexity.
LanguageData.MGC_GeneTuningMinTooltip: The floor of how much metabolic efficiency a pawn can have. Metabolic efficiency does not have any further effect past -5.
